reload

@Override
void reload()
Stops all consumers and connections, reloads the application configurations, and finally starts all connections and consumers. Calling this method will retain any manually registered consumers and connections unless they are overridden by the configuration.

reset

@Override
void reset()
Stops all consumers and connections, and removes any registered contexts.

shutdown

@Override
void shutdown()
Perform a graceful shutdown of consumers and then disconnects. This method blocks until the full shutdown is complete.

start

@Override
void start()
Starts all connections, creates exchanges and queues, and starts all consumers.

start

@Override
void start(boolean deferConsumers)
Starts all connections and creates exchanges and queues. Optionally starts consumers. This method is useful in situation where the system needs to be started up but other work needs to be done before messages can start consuming.
Parameters:
deferConsumers

void startConnection(java.lang.String name)

stop

@Override
void stop()
Stops all consumers and connections.

stopConnection

@Override
void stopConnection(java.lang.String name)
Stops the connection with the given name. This will also stop all consumers using the connection.
Parameters:
name

stopConnections

@Override
void stopConnections()
Stops all connections. This will also stop all consumers.

Parameters:
